Title: Destination Wedding
Writer: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (creator), Ilana Glazer (creator)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, John Gemberling, Arturo Castro
Plot: The girls, along with Lincoln and some old catering co-workers, head to a wedding. While the trip becomes a comedy of errors, Ilana must confront Abbi's past friendships.
